issue.title: [Python][Docs] Add compute documentation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13232](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13232). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
While compute documentation in C++ are clear the compute documentation in Python is vague. It is necessary to add compute documentation in Python so that users can easily find how to use this very useful module.
